operation.name: update
operation.sql: update dc_user set logon_passwd=?, nick_name=?, birthday=?, cert_no=?, gender=?, work_site=?, projects=?, info_site=?, status=?, gmt_modify=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = ?;
operation.sqlmap:
update dc_user set gmt_modify=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, <dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="logonPasswd"> logon_passwd = #logonPasswd#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="nickName"> nick_name = #nickName#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="birthday"> birthday = #birthday#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="certNo"> cert_no = #certNo#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="gender"> gender = #gender#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="workSite"> work_site = #workSite#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="projects"> projects = #projects#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="infoSite"> info_site = #infoSite#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="status"> status = #status# </isNotEmpty>
</dynamic> where id = #id#;
